hero.description: SCUDOO Holding deploys high-impact digital ecosystems, unifying fitness, health, and technology. From strategic vision to operational excellence, we design platforms that redefine industry standards.

1.title: Innovation & Technology
1.description: We develop scalable and secure systems, ranging from biometric access control to real-time videoconferencing, to redefine the user experience.

2.title: Wellness & E-Commerce
2.description: Through our cosmetics brands and subscription services, we build digital bridges between premium products and consumer needs.

3.title: State-of-the-art equipment
3.description: We integrate body analysis and 3D visualization technologies to provide precision tools for fitness professionals.

1.title: SaaS & IoT
1.description: Sign up in less than 5 minutes, NFC/biometric access control, integrated WebRTC videoconferencing, and health data tracking.

2.title: Subscription & Automation
2.description: Recurring subscription management via Stripe, CRM automation, and affiliate system for influencers.

3.title: 3D expertise
3.description: Catalog with interactive 3D visualization, integration of body scans, and online financing tools.

careers.title: Join the SCUDOO team
careers.description: We are looking for builders capable of designing scalable, secure, and high-performance systems.
